channel.title: Mongo on ByteGopher
channel.description: Recent content in Mongo on ByteGopher

item.title: 「Mongo」Mongo golang sdk
item.description: mongo 基本数据类型 Type bosun.E type E struct { Key string Value interface{} } E represents a BSON element for a D. It is usually used inside a D. bosun.D type D []E D is an ordered representation of a BSON document. This type should be used when the order of the elements matters, // such as MongoDB command documents. If the order of the elements does not matter, an M should be used instead.
